Title: Relates to mandating continuing medical education for pediatric primary care physicians on the topic of children's mental health
Summary: Mandates continuing medical education for pediatric primary care physicians on the topic of mental health in accordance with regulations prescribed by the department and the office of the professions; includes training provided by the office of mental health Project TEACH program.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to mandating continuing medical education for pediatric primary care physicians on the topic of children's mental health
